name: Biophilia
description:
Biophilia (noun) a love of life and the living world.

There's a disconnect between the human and man made material world that gives you the urge to just live, explore, and be the master of your own life, your own story through surviving and not mastering nature, but being able to harness it and live amongst it all. It's beautiful after all.

I haven't gone camping in 3 years, and I've missed it ever since.

song used: We Are Trees - Sunrise Sunset
